item.title: ITACLIP: Boosting Training-Free Semantic Segmentation with Image, Text, and Architectural Enhancements
item.description: ITACLIP boosts training-free semantic segmentation by architecturally enhancing CLIP, integrating LLM-generated class descriptions, and employing image engineering; achieving state-of-the-art results.
